table.caption: Strangers in the Mists
rows: Someone from another world who's just been drawn into a domain by the Mists
Someone fleeing the Darklord of another domain
A raven carrying a message from the Keepers of the Feather
Curious members of the Keepers of the Feather led by a {@creature wereraven|VRGR} (see {@book chapter 5|VRGR|5}) in disguise
A spirit that cries out before being yanked back into the Mists, leaving behind a Mist talisman
